subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jimmer Fredette, last season’s national player of the year from Brigham Young, and Kawhi Leonard, the San Diego State star, are expected to be selected in the top 20.
snippet: Jimmer Fredette, last season’s national player of the year from Brigham Young, and Kawhi Leonard, the San Diego State star, are expected to be selected in the top 20.
